SectionBody.Text: In addition to other provisions of the code cited in ss. 628.6011-628.6018:

Subsection.Text: Applicable sections of part VI of chapter 626; s. 626.9541(1)(a), (b), (c), (d), (e), (f), (h), (i), (j), (k), (l), (m), (n), (o), (q), (u), (w), and (x); and ss. 626.9561-626.9641;
Relevant sections of part I of chapter 628 that are not in conflict with the express provisions of this part;

SectionBody.Text: apply to assessable mutual insurers; however, ss. 628.255, 628.411, and 628.421 do not apply. No section of the code not expressly and specifically cited in ss. 628.6011-628.6018 applies to assessable mutual insurers. The term “assessable mutual insurer” shall be substituted for the term “commercial self-insurer” as appropriate.
